<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8" />
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1" />
  <title>Simple E-commerce Demo</title>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css" />
</head>
<body>
  <header class="site-header">
    <div class="container header-inner">
      <h1 class="logo">ShoeStore</h1>
      <nav>
        <button id="cart-btn" class="cart-btn">Cart (<span id="cart-count">0</span>)</button>
      </nav>
    </div>
  </header>

  <main class="container">
    <section class="hero">
      <h1>MENS & WOMENS SHOESTORE</h1>
    </section>

    <section id="products" class="products-grid"></section>

    <section id="checkout-section" class="checkout hidden">
      <h3>Checkout</h3>
      <form id="checkout-form">
        <label>
          Full name
          <input type="text" id="name" required />
        </label>
        <label>
          Address
          <input type="text" id="address" required />
        </label>
        <label>
          Email
          <input type="email" id="email" required />
        </label>
        <button type="submit" class="btn">Place Order</button>
      </form>
      <button id="close-checkout" class="btn secondary">Close</button>
    </section>
  </main>

  <!-- Cart drawer -->
  <aside id="cart-drawer" class="cart-drawer hidden">
    <div class="cart-header">
      <h3>Your Cart</h3>
      <button id="close-cart" class="close">✕</button>
    </div>
    <div id="cart-list" class="cart-list"></div>
    <div class="cart-footer">
      <div class="cart-total">Total: ₹<span id="cart-total">0.00</span></div>
      <div class="cart-actions">
        <button id="clear-cart" class="btn secondary">Clear</button>
        <button id="proceed-checkout" class="btn">Checkout</button>
      </div>
    </div>
  </aside>

  <template id="product-template">
    <article class="product-card">
      <img class="product-image" src="" alt="" />
      <div class="product-body">
        <h4 class="product-title"></h4>
        <div class="product-price">₹<span class="price-val"></span></div>
        <div class="product-actions">
          <button class="btn add-cart">Add to cart</button>
          <button class="btn secondary quick-view">Quick View</button>
        </div>
      </div>
    </article>
  </template>

  <!-- Quick view modal -->
  <div id="modal" class="modal hidden">
    <div class="modal-content">
      <button id="modal-close" class="close">✕</button>
      <img id="modal-image" src="" alt="" />
      <h3 id="modal-title"></h3>
      <p id="modal-desc"></p>
      <div class="modal-row">
        <div class="modal-price">₹<span id="modal-price"></span></div>
        <button id="modal-add" class="btn">Add to cart</button>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <footer class="site-footer">
    <div class="container">© <span id="year"></span> ShoeStore — Demo</div>
  </footer>

  <script src="script.js"></script>
<style>
    :root{
  --max-width:1100px;
  --gap:1rem;
  --accent:#1f7a8c;
  --muted:#666;
  --card-bg:#fff;
  --shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
  --radius:10px;
}

*{box-sizing:border-box}
body{
  font-family: system-ui,-apple-system,Segoe UI,Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",Arial;
  margin:0;
  background:#f5f7fb;
  color:#111;
  -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing:grayscale;
}

.container{
  max-width:var(--max-width);
  margin:0 auto;
  padding:1rem;
}

.site-header{
  background:#fff;
  border-bottom:1px solid #eee;
  position:sticky;
  top:0;
  z-index:10;
}
.header-inner{
  display:flex;
  align-items:center;
  justify-content:space-between;
  gap:var(--gap);
}
.logo{margin:0;font-size:1.25rem;color:var(--accent)}
.cart-btn{background:none;border:1px solid var(--accent);padding:.35rem .6rem;border-radius:8px;cursor:pointer}

.hero{padding:1.2rem 0}
.products-grid{
  display:grid;
  gap:1rem;
  grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill, minmax(220px,1fr));
  margin-bottom:2rem;
}

/* product card */
.product-card{
  background:var(--card-bg);
  border-radius:var(--radius);
  box-shadow:var(--shadow);
  overflow:hidden;
  display:flex;
  flex-direction:column;
  min-height:320px;
}
.product-image{width:100%;height:180px;object-fit:cover}
.product-body{padding:1rem;display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:.5rem;flex:1}
.product-title{margin:0;font-size:1rem}
.product-price{font-weight:700;color:var(--accent)}
.product-actions{margin-top:auto;display:flex;gap:.5rem}
.btn{
  border:0;padding:.6rem .8rem;border-radius:8px;cursor:pointer;background:var(--accent);color:#fff;font-weight:600;
}
.btn.secondary{background:transparent;border:1px solid #ccc;color:var(--muted);font-weight:600}

/* cart drawer */
.cart-drawer{
  position:fixed;right:0;top:0;height:100vh;width:360px;background:#fff;box-shadow: -20px 0 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);padding:1rem;display:flex;flex-direction:column;z-index:40;
}
.cart-header{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center}
.cart-list{flex:1;overflow:auto;margin-top:1rem}
.cart-item{display:flex;gap:.75rem;align-items:center;padding:.6rem;border-radius:8px;border:1px solid #f0f0f0;margin-bottom:.6rem}
.cart-item img{width:64px;height:64px;object-fit:cover;border-radius:8px}
.cart-item-info{flex:1}
.qty-controls{display:flex;gap:.4rem;align-items:center}
.cart-footer{border-top:1px solid #eee;padding-top:.8rem;display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:.6rem}

/* modal */
.modal{
  position:fixed;inset:0;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;background:rgba(0,0,0,0.4);z-index:50;padding:1rem;
}
.modal-content{background:#fff;padding:1rem;border-radius:12px;max-width:700px;width:100%;box-shadow:var(--shadow);display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;gap:1rem;align-items:start}
.modal-content img{width:100%;height:260px;object-fit:cover;border-radius:8px}
.modal-content .close{position:absolute;right:1rem;top:1rem;background:transparent;border:0;font-size:1.1rem;cursor:pointer}

/* small screens */
@media (max-width:680px){
  .modal-content{grid-template-columns:1fr; padding-top:2.5rem}
  .cart-drawer{width:100%}
}

/* misc */
.hidden{display:none}
.close{background:transparent;border:0;font-size:1.1rem;cursor:pointer}
.checkout{background:#fff;padding:1rem;border-radius:10px;box-shadow:var(--shadow)}
label{display:block;margin-bottom:.6rem}
input{width:100%;padding:.6rem;border-radius:8px;border:1px solid #ddd}
.site-footer{padding:1rem 0;text-align:center;color:var(--muted);margin-top:2rem}
</style>
<script>
// sample product data
const PRODUCTS = [
  {
    id: 'p1',
    title: 'Classic Runner - Black',
    price: 2499,
    img: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1542291026-7eec264c27ff?q=80&w=800&auto=format&fit=crop&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&s=1'
  },
  {
    id: 'p2',
    title: 'Hitz Mens- Black',
    price: 2799,
    img: 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSP8W9Z8gkoDZ75wS0xMKU0RF7bGX3kthy8GQ&s'
  },
  {
    id: 'p3',
    title: 'Tan Lace- Leather',
    price: 3199,
    img: 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS2aXMFiJDzWHkP7y6rvBvjHodf2B7bNg-kLQ&s'
  },
  {
    id: 'p4',
    title: 'Hi-Top Retro - Navy',
    price: 1999,
    img: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,'
  },
  {
    id: 'p5',
    title: 'Casual Slip-on - Grey',
    price: 1599,
    img: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,'
  },
  {
    id: 'p6',
    title: 'Chunky Heel Boots',
    price: 2599,
    img: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,'
  },
  {
    id: 'p7',
    title: 'Stylish Trendy Kids for Girls',
    price: 1999,
    img: 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRUP3NphT1FwGnkgPxL9bn2og9rgVcak5_DfDQ-jM0XYUKDdYh42yAP9Un02ZvPYzHcKVM&usqp=CAU'
  },
  {
    id: 'p8',
    title: 'DSC Drifter cricket shoes',
    price: 2999,
    img: 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSN1Yj3qUZIKN9TGqMNstDjRdibe6VMlKJfqLy7JiH_gtMgdzQaq3PcFsGFeExf3MC5h04&usqp=CAU'
  },
  {
    id: 'p9',
    title: 'Outdoor Hiking shoes',
    price: 3099,
    img: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,'
  },
  {
    id: 'p10',
    title: 'Swim fin shoes',
    price: 2499,
    img: 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQXVLZpSbl5S2BuSSEq1oc_X1tXVRi0lAubNKxcK1k8DkiyoD8N2c_tnR_JNFPVzaw-Zm0&usqp=CAU'
  },
];
const $ = (sel) => document.querySelector(sel);
const $all = (sel) => Array.from(document.querySelectorAll(sel));

const productsEl = $('#products');
const productTemplate = document.getElementById('product-template');
const cartBtn = $('#cart-btn');
const cartDrawer = $('#cart-drawer');
const closeCart = $('#close-cart');
const cartList = $('#cart-list');
const cartCountEl = $('#cart-count');
const cartTotalEl = $('#cart-total');
const clearCartBtn = $('#clear-cart');
const proceedCheckout = $('#proceed-checkout');
const checkoutSection = $('#checkout-section');
const closeCheckout = $('#close-checkout');
const modal = $('#modal');
const modalClose = $('#modal-close');
const modalImage = $('#modal-image');
const modalTitle = $('#modal-title');
const modalDesc = $('#modal-desc');
const modalPrice = $('#modal-price');
const modalAdd = $('#modal-add');

let cart = {}; // { productId: qty }

// Utilities
function formatCurrency(n){ return (n).toFixed(2); }

function saveCart(){
  localStorage.setItem('cart', JSON.stringify(cart));
}
function loadCart(){
  try{
    cart = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart')) || {};
  }catch(e){
    cart = {};
  }
}

function renderProducts(){
  productsEl.innerHTML = '';
  PRODUCTS.forEach(p => {
    const clone = productTemplate.content.cloneNode(true);
    const card = clone.querySelector('.product-card');
    card.querySelector('.product-image').src = p.img;
    card.querySelector('.product-image').alt = p.title;
    card.querySelector('.product-title').textContent = p.title;
    card.querySelector('.price-val').textContent = p.price;
    const addBtn = clone.querySelector('.add-cart');
    addBtn.addEventListener('click', () => { addToCart(p.id); });
    const quickBtn = clone.querySelector('.quick-view');
    quickBtn.addEventListener('click', () => openModal(p));
    productsEl.appendChild(clone);
  });
}

function addToCart(id, qty = 1){
  cart[id] = (cart[id] || 0) + qty;
  saveCart();
  renderCart();
}

function removeFromCart(id){
  delete cart[id];
  saveCart();
  renderCart();
}

function changeQty(id, qty){
  if(qty <= 0) removeFromCart(id);
  else cart[id] = qty;
  saveCart();
  renderCart();
}

function cartItems(){
  return Object.entries(cart).map(([id, qty]) => {
    const prod = PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === id);
    return { ...prod, qty };
  });
}

function cartTotal(){
  return cartItems().reduce((s, it) => s + (it.price * it.qty), 0);
}

function renderCart(){
  const items = cartItems();
  cartList.innerHTML = '';
  if(items.length === 0){
    cartList.innerHTML = '<p style="color:#666">Cart is empty</p>';
  } else {
    items.forEach(it => {
      const itemEl = document.createElement('div');
      itemEl.className = 'cart-item';
      itemEl.innerHTML = `
        <img src="${it.img}" alt="${it.title}" />
        <div class="cart-item-info">
          <div style="font-weight:700">${it.title}</div>
          <div style="color:var(--muted)">₹${it.price} × ${it.qty}</div>
          <div class="qty-controls" style="margin-top:.45rem">
            <button class="btn secondary dec">-</button>
            <div style="padding:.25rem .5rem;border:1px solid #eee;border-radius:6px">${it.qty}</div>
            <button class="btn secondary inc">+</button>
            <button class="btn secondary remove" style="margin-left:6px">Remove</button>
          </div>
        </div>
      `;
      cartList.appendChild(itemEl);
      itemEl.querySelector('.inc').addEventListener('click', () => changeQty(it.id, it.qty + 1));
      itemEl.querySelector('.dec').addEventListener('click', () => changeQty(it.id, it.qty - 1));
      itemEl.querySelector('.remove').addEventListener('click', () => removeFromCart(it.id));
    });
  }
  cartCountEl.textContent = Object.values(cart).reduce((a,b)=>a+b,0);
  cartTotalEl.textContent = formatCurrency(cartTotal());
}

function openCart(){ cartDrawer.classList.remove('hidden'); renderCart(); }
function closeCartFn(){ cartDrawer.classList.add('hidden'); }

function openModal(product){
  modalImage.src = product.img;
  modalTitle.textContent = product.title;
  modalDesc.textContent = 'Comfort, style, and versatility — perfect for everyday wear.';
  modalPrice.textContent = product.price;
  modalAdd.onclick = () => { addToCart(product.id); modal.classList.add('hidden'); openCart(); };
  modal.classList.remove('hidden');
}

function init(){
  document.getElementById('year').textContent = new Date().getFullYear();
  loadCart();
  renderProducts();
  renderCart();

  cartBtn.addEventListener('click', openCart);
  closeCart.addEventListener('click', closeCartFn);
  clearCartBtn.addEventListener('click', () => { cart = {}; saveCart(); renderCart(); });

  proceedCheckout.addEventListener('click', () => {
    checkoutSection.classList.remove('hidden');
    cartDrawer.classList.add('hidden');
  });
  closeCheckout.addEventListener('click', () => checkoutSection.classList.add('hidden'));

  modalClose.addEventListener('click', () => modal.classList.add('hidden'));
  window.addEventListener('click', (e) => { if(e.target === modal) modal.classList.add('hidden'); });

  // handle checkout submit
  document.getElementById('checkout-form').addEventListener('submit', (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    // simple simulation of placing order
    alert('Order placed! Thank you — (demo).');
    cart = {};
    saveCart();
    renderCart();
    checkoutSection.classList.add('hidden');
  });
}

init();
</script>
</body>
</html>
